data.title: â˜… Carl Gottlieb Address
data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to Carl Gottlieb
data.text:
Feedback received:

Wonderful response from Mr. Carl Gottlieb!! :) - July 11th, 2020

Recd form letter saying most people who wants his autographs are dealers and will sell them The letter goes on and says If I am truly serious I need to send him $25.00 Used PO Box 46097 LA Ca address Sent 6-27-20 Recd 7-11-20 Comment | View 1 comment(s) Wonderful response from Mr. Carl Gottlieb!! :) - May 5th, 2013

Ohh my goodness I was soo thrilled this Saturday morning when I went to the mail box I got a response from Mr. Carl Gottlieb - acclaimed writer of THE JAWS LOG- he also made an appearance in the film and was one of the main screenwriters working beside Steven Speilberg during production! I am a HUGE JAWS fan so this meant the WORLD to me- about 2 months ago I sent out a letter, photo and SASE using the address from the database. Thank you so very much FanmaiBiz and THANK YOU Mr. Carl Gottlieb- he was soo cool he even included a SECOND photo with the note "included a better photo"! and personalized and dated it to me!! Yeeeeeeee Here is the address I used from the database: Carl Gottlieb P.O. Box 461539 Los Angeles, CA 90046 USA Here are the TWO photos he sent back to me - and my envelope : - Comment | View 1 comment(s) Carl Gottlieb- TTM Success!!! - March 11th, 2013

Hi Everyone! On 11 Feb 2013, I sent a fan LOR, photo & SASE to Mr. Gottlieb, and on 8 March 2013 I received my photo back signed! I used this address: P.O. Box 461539 Los Angeles, CA 90046 Photo: - Envelope: - Comment | View 1 comment(s)
